remarks: Define set of all projective lines for a Hilbert lattice (actually in any set at all, for simplicity).  The join of two distinct atoms equals a line.  Definition of lines in item 1 of [Holland95] p. 222. (Contributed by NM, 19-Sep-2011.)
statement:
df-lines $p |- Lines = ( k e. _V |-> { s | E. q e. ( Atoms ` k ) E. r e. ( Atoms ` k ) ( q =/= r /\ s = { p e. ( Atoms ` k ) | p ( le ` k ) ( q ( join ` k ) r ) } ) } ) $.
$d k p q r s $.
